metadata.title: CVE-2019-18359 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A buffer over-read was discovered in ReadMP3APETag in apetag.c in MP3Gain1.6.2. The vulnerability causes an application crash, which leads to remotedenial of service.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
